pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Foot Peel
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Dual layered booties contain an exfoliating serum packed with Plant Extracts and Alpha Hydroxy Acids for soft, silky smooth feet. The outer layer of the booties stays dry so you can continue with daily activities.

  •  Peels dead skin in 7 days
  • Helps remove calluses and rough skin
  • Helps soothe, rough dry feet and heels

Alpha Hydroxy Acids remove dead skin in just 7 days. 15 Plant Extracts including Ginkgo Biloba, Green Tea and Vitamin E intensely moisturise, leaving feet soft and silky smooth.

Ingredients

Alcohol, Water (Aqua), Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Glycerin, Arginine, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Butylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Salicylic Acid, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Betaine, Disodium EDTA, Urea, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Tocopheryl Acetate, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Paeonia Albiflora Root Extract, Sophora Angustifolia Root Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Fragrance

Directions

Cleanse feet, tear open sachet and remove booties, place feet inside (taking care to make sure your foot is inside the inner layer), wear for 90-120 minutes, remove booties and rinse thoroughly.
